metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4517 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Apache Santuario XML Security for Java before 1.5.6, when applying Transforms, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via crafted Document Type Definitions (DTDs), related to signatures.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-security-java - 2.0.10-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml-security-java package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.10-2').
